item.title: Digimon Story: Time Stranger DLC Roadmap—All Season Pass & Additional Content
item.content:encoded:
Digimon Story: Time Stranger already has plenty of content to sink your teeth into, but Bandai Namco isn’t holding back, and plenty more is on the cards to be added in upcoming DLC.

While it will take a while to gather all the Digimon in the game, particularly given that Digi-Eggs are required for some, the list of Digimon will get even longer with upcoming content drops, which will also extend the main story of the game with new episodes.

If you’re mulling over which DLC to purchase, or want to know what’s included in the Season Pass, we’ve got all the important details.

All Upcoming Digimon Story: Time Stranger DLC & Release Windows

Three Episode Packs are confirmed to be coming to Digimon Story: Time Stranger as DLC and in the season pass, though an exact release date has not been set.

Available in the Season Pass, Episode Packs 1-3 will all be released in the next calendar year, with Bandai Namco confirming the content will drop before September 30, 2026.

At this stage, though, it’s unclear when exactly each Episode Pack will drop, and whether the DLC cycle will be extended beyond an additional year.

The table below lists all upcoming DLC, which we’ll update to include release dates as they are confirmed.

All Available Digimon Story: Time Stranger DLC

Several pieces of DLC are already available for Digimon Story: Time Stranger, many of which are included in the Ultimate Edition and Deluxe Edition.

While the Episode Packs bring additional Digimon and new content, the other DLC currently available in the game are mostly just cosmetic options. However, there are some that provide in-game boosts with additional items and currency, acting as a head-start pack.

The table below shows all currently available DLC, the edition of the game it’s included in, and whether it’s available to purchase separately.

Have you purchased any DLC for Digimon Story: Time Stranger? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more Digimon Story: Time Stranger, check out all the Digimon Personalities and their boosts, and find out where to get Iron Slash 1.
